bio: Welcome to my page! As a software engineer, my primary interests are in product and application development. Through my experiences, I've gained skills in developing and deploying front-end web applications, APIs, and databases. I'm well-versed in a variety of programming languages and technologies such as Python, JavaScript, React, and AWS services. As a software engineer, I'm motivated by opportunities to solve immediate, real-world problems.
title: University of Virginia Student, graduating May 2022 open to full-time software engineering roles
name: Adriel Kim
